urlpatterns = [
    path('', views.home_page, name='home_page'),
    path('currency-details/', views.currency_details_page, name='currency_details_page'),

]

from django.db import models

class Currency(models.Model):
    code = models.CharField(max_length=3)
    name = models.CharField(max_length=100)

class ExchangeRate(models.Model):
    base_currency = models.ForeignKey(Currency, related_name='base_currency', on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    target_currency = models.ForeignKey(Currency, related_name='target_currency', on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    rate = models.FloatField()
    date = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
<!-- HTML Template for Currency Details Page -->

from django.urls import path
from . import views

urlpatterns = [
    path('', views.home, name='home'),
    path('options/', views.password_options, name='password_options'),
    path('generate/', views.generated_password, name='generated_password'),
    path('about/', views.about, name='about'),
]

Welcome to the Password Generator

Go to Password Generator

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Password Options</title>
</head>
<body>
    <form method="post" action="{% url 'generated_password' %}">
        {% csrf_token %}
        <label for="length">Password Length:</label>
        <input type="number" id="length" name="length" required>

        <label>
            <input type="checkbox" name="uppercase" checked>
            Include Uppercase
        </label>
        <label>
            <input type="checkbox" name="lowercase" checked>
            Include Lowercase
        </label>
        <label>
            <input type="checkbox" name="numbers" checked>
            Include Numbers
        </label>
        <label>
            <input type="checkbox" name="symbols" checked>
            Include Symbols
        </label>

        <button type="submit">Generate Password</button>
    </form>
</body>
</html>

Your Generated Password:

{{ password }}

About This Website

This website allows you to generate secure, random passwords based on your chosen criteria.

6.code:
from django.db import models

class TodoList(models.Model):
    name = models.CharField(max_length=255)

class Task(models.Model):
    list = models.ForeignKey(TodoList, related_name='tasks', on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    name = models.CharField(max_length=255)
    is_completed = models.BooleanField(default=False)

from django.urls import path
from . import views

urlpatterns = [
    path('', views.view_dashboard, name='home'),
    path('todolist/new/', views.create_new_list, name='create_new_list'),
    path('todolist/<int:list_id>/', views.view_tasks, name='view_tasks'),
    path('task/new/<int:list_id>/', views.add_new_task, name='add_new_task'),
    path('task/edit/<int:task_id>/', views.edit_task, name='edit_task'),
    path('task/delete/<int:task_id>/', views.delete_task, name='delete_task'),
    path('task/complete/<int:task_id>/', views.mark_task_as_completed, name='mark_task_as_completed')
]

from django.urls import path
from . import views

urlpatterns = [
    path('', views.home_view, name='home'),
    path('calendar/', views.calendar_view, name='calendar'),
    path('calendar/add/', views.add_event_view, name='add_event'),
    path('event/<int:event_id>/', views.event_details_view, name='event_details'),
    path('event/search/', views.search_events_view, name='search_events'),
    path('event/list/', views.list_all_events_view, name='list_all_events'),
    path('event/edit/<int:event_id>/', views.edit_event_view, name='edit_event'),
    path('event/delete/<int:event_id>/', views.delete_event_view, name='delete_event'),
    path('help/faq/', views.faq_view, name='faq'),
    path('help/user-guide/', views.user_guide_view, name='user_guide'),
]

from django.db import models

class Event(models.Model):
    title = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    description = models.TextField()
    date = models.DateField()
    time = models.TimeField()

    def __str__(self):
        return f"{self.title} on {self.date}"

from django.db import models
from django.contrib.auth.models import User

class Meal(models.Model):
    user = models.ForeignKey(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    name = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    calories = models.IntegerField()

class Activity(models.Model):
    user = models.ForeignKey(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    name = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    calories_burned = models.IntegerField()

13.code:
from django.urls import path
from .views import (HomePageView, AddCustomerView, EditCustomerView, DeleteCustomerView, 
                    ViewCustomerView, AddProductView, EditProductView, DeleteProductView, 
                    ViewProductView, AddPurchaseRecordView, EditPurchaseRecordView, 
                    DeletePurchaseRecordView, ViewPurchaseRecordView, AddPreferredProductView, 
                    EditPreferredProductView, DeletePreferredProductView, 
                    ViewPreferredProductsView, GenerateSalesReportView, AnalyzeSalesTrendsView, 
                    ProductPerformanceAnalysisView)

urlpatterns = [
    path('', HomePageView.as_view(), name='home'),
    path('customer/add/', AddCustomerView.as_view(), name='add_customer'),
    path('customer/edit/<int:customer_id>/', EditCustomerView.as_view(), name='edit_customer'),
    path('customer/delete/<int:customer_id>/', DeleteCustomerView.as_view(), name='delete_customer'),
    path('customer/view/<int:customer_id>/', ViewCustomerView.as_view(), name='view_customer'),
    path('product/add/', AddProductView.as_view(), name='add_product'),
    path('product/edit/<int:product_id>/', EditProductView.as_view(), name='edit_product'),
    path('product/delete/<int:product_id>/', DeleteProductView.as_view(), name='delete_product'),
    path('product/view/<int:product_id>/', ViewProductView.as_view(), name='view_product'),
    path('purchase/add/', AddPurchaseRecordView.as_view(), name='add_purchase_record'),
    path('purchase/edit/<int:record_id>/', EditPurchaseRecordView.as_view(), name='edit_purchase_record'),
    path('purchase/delete/<int:record_id>/', DeletePurchaseRecordView.as_view(), name='delete_purchase_record'),
    path('purchase/view/<int:record_id>/', ViewPurchaseRecordView.as_view(), name='view_purchase_record'),
    path('preferred_product/add/<int:customer_id>/', AddPreferredProductView.as_view(), name='add_preferred_product'),
    path('preferred_product/edit/<int:customer_id>/', EditPreferredProductView.as_view(), name='edit_preferred_product'),
    path('preferred_product/delete/<int:customer_id>/', DeletePreferredProductView.as_view(), name='delete_preferred_product'),
    path('preferred_product/view/<int:customer_id>/', ViewPreferredProductsView.as_view(), name='view_preferred_products'),
    path('sales_report/', GenerateSalesReportView.as_view(), name='generate_sales_report'),
    path('sales_trends/', AnalyzeSalesTrendsView.as_view(), name='analyze_sales_trends'),
    path('product_performance/', ProductPerformanceAnalysisView.as_view(), name='product_performance_analysis'),
]

    created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
    # Other necessary fields
